summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Building Construction Codes; adding a new Chapter 22.420, the Seattle Fuel Gas Code, to the Seattle Municipal Code; adopting Chapters 2 through 8 and amending Chapters 2, Definitions; Chapter 3, General Regulations; Chapter 4, Gas Piping Installations; Chapter 6, Specific Appliances; and Chapter 7, Gaseous Hydrogen Systems of the 2003 International Fuel Gas Code; and adding a new Chapter 1 related to administration, permitting and enforcement.
